website_summaries.verdict: This affordable milk cleanser is extremely effective for revitalizing dehydrated skin.
pros: Rice bran oil base soothes and softens skin
Rich in Vitamin E, antioxidants, and nourishing fatty acids

customer_reviews.title: Great for Removing Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully for removing makeup, even the really heavy foundation or waterproof mascara. It's also great for sensitive or dry skin; I use it every night and it always makes my skin feel soft and hasn't broken me out yet, even though I'm a bit acne-prone. Plus, it's available in such a large size!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Waday

customer_reviews.title: So good. Clears away make-up and leaves your skin feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: So good. Clears away make-up and leaves your skin feeling super hydrated! I have very sensitive skin that is a combination of both oily and dry. Was looking for a good product to use before bed that moisturized my face without making me wake up oily and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Odom

customer_reviews.title: Just can’t love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been really trying to love this product, but I don’t even like it. I have dry, sensitive skin and thought this would be a great cleanser but it leaves a film all over my face that I feel like I have to work harder to remove. I’m a huge skin care junkie and have a few Mario products, but this one is a flunk. If your skin is like mine - Bioelements Moisture Positive Cleanser is a much better solution. Or for a more affordable cleanser, Skinfix foaming oil is great (DOESNT clog pores either!)
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Engels

customer_reviews.title: very soothing for my rosacea-prone skin. calms it right ...
customer_reviews.text: very soothing for my rosacea-prone skin. calms it right down. doesn't take away all redness but it helps and is very gentle.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product! Use it almost everyday! I feel like I’m doing something good for my skin when I use this altho I do feel the need to wash my face still after. Very moisturizing and it does do such a good job getting makeup off that if I can’t wash my face or am too tired too I don’t feel guilty using this alone
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible & Easy to Use Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results! The redness in my cheeks has gone way down and I have a much more even complexion after just 4 days. I've been using this nightly as directed on my face followed with the Mario Badescu face spray (which is also phenomenal). It doesn't really have a smell, it leaves my skin feeling really soft, & it magically fixes skin problems. Even my acne has cleared up! I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Terryoke

customer_reviews.title: Bye, bye rosacea and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes, yes! What a wonderful product! This is the first time I have tried a Mario Bedescu product and I am so impressed. I have very dry skin and rosacea. This cleansing milk is gentle as well as soothing. I noticed the bumps from rosacea were beginning to disappear within the first two weeks. I certainly look forward to more improvements over time. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M Salz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. It literally feels like you’re washing your face with milk. It didn’t feel like it cleaned anything off either. I threw it out after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizing Cleanser!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders! I’m so happy that I purchased it. I use this wash before I clean my face with the enzyme cleanser but you are able to use it alone. Leaves you with “Glass” skin!
customer_reviews.author: Chaela

customer_reviews.title: 👍A good, budget alternative to expensive French cleansing milks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheaper alternative to the Claudalie Cleansing Milk and I was pleased. The odor is pleasant and the texture of the lotion is not greasy at all. This has become my go-to travel makeup remover and cleanser in one.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: feels like plastic on your fact after you wash your face.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely complain about a cleanser but this was not a good product. I don't like it at all. Feels cheap and leaves a film on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Miss piggy

customer_reviews.title: A good moisturizing face cleanser-removes eye makeup too!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a tiny amount to cleanse. My face feels clean and moisturized. It removes eye makeup pretty easy. I’ve been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: you can see the dirt come off
customer_reviews.text: it is very gentle. i like to use cotton balls in my first step of cleaning my skin and throughout puberty i used rubbing alcohol because it helped with acne a lot but it was also very drying and i recently began using this and my sahara desert skin patches are extremely grateful
customer_reviews.author: 𖦹

customer_reviews.title: I love the earthy clay smell
customer_reviews.text: It's all I use. My daughter is an aesthetician and now she's ordered it for her clients. I love the earthy clay smell. It is very moisturizing and nourishing for your skin. The aloe rose water spray toner is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ianni

customer_reviews.title: Heavy feeling after wash. Philosophy wash better
customer_reviews.text: Can feel moisture but leaves heaviness on skin. Prefer Philosophy wash
customer_reviews.author: Dani34

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and love this brand! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I love that you don't really have to wash your makeup off with water when you use this. It makes removing on late nights much less of a chore. It's also pretty moisturizing, which is important to me as I have very dry skin. I've had this makeup remover for a couple months and I'm only halfway through the bottle! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Left a filmy residue- ugh. Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Left a film on my skin that would NOT rinse away. I do have dry skin but still ....
customer_reviews.author: Margit J.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best cleanser I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: Product says to just wipe off with a tissue. But when you do that it leaves a film on skin That becomes oily over time. So to avoid the oily film you have to rinse it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: I just used this product for the first time. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just used this product for the first time. It is really gentle on my skin, but it left a layer of oil on it. I sprayed some toner on my face, and it absorbed most of the oil.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: It's meh
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but felt it was expensive for how much product there was and how much you have to use. Didn't really do much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Loud41

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & silky
customer_reviews.text: Don’t feel like it does much cleansing but this would be considered a pre cleanser so it def helps break down the initial layer of dirt and oils . I love the application
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing Milk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light product and is does a nice job keeping your skin soft and hydrated. I do prefer the Seaweed Cleansing lotion.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say I will not purchase again. Only used 1/2 of the bottle. It made my Clarisonic brush filthy. It's kind a dirt magnet. Was really excited about this line of products too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McDowell

customer_reviews.title: My skin has never felt cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have used many micellar waters and face washes and my skin never feels like it has been deeply cleansed. With this product my skin feels cleansed and moisturized, takes off makeup effortlessly. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my skin feel amazingly clean and soft. The milk really keeps my skin healthy looking and fresh. I wipe it off after applying with a cotton pad with a little bit of toner on it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Jolly

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: Not working, lots of oil left on my skin after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Baosong wu

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Loved how this made my dry skin feel moisturized and removed makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Champion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face wash
customer_reviews.text: So, so awesome for dry skin. This rich and creamy formula dissolves makeup and tissues off to reveal super soft and hydrated skin. I use this every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I rate it a 3 because the product came, and it exploded in the bag! Other than that, the product is fine. Definitely look into his other skincare products as well!
customer_reviews.author: Carmella Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Leaves filmy residue on face
customer_reviews.text: Product feels really greasy on skin and leaves a sticky residue that I didn’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Molly D Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues with chronic redness or rosacea, this is the product for you. Soothes instantly, and noticibly improved the look of skin in one wash. Will never buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rich and creamy
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash. My face feels smooth and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to remove makeup with this its awesome
customer_reviews.author: urooj

customer_reviews.title: Welcome Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend; she seems to like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Facey

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's not Asian skincare like the rest of my routine but it's the only product that'll get rid of all of my makeup (minus my WP mascara). I also dislike dealing with cleaning oils as they're super messy to me. I will repurchase this once I'm out
customer_reviews.author: Samira

customer_reviews.title: Gentle product, but does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle and refreshing. I had to stop using my regular soap because I am trying everything under the sun to combat my suddenly ridiculously chapped lips. My cleansing routine was all I could come up with- so I tried the cleansing milk. I can see why everyone love his products. Indulgent yet affordable. Once my lips are completely healed I am going to try the glycolic toner I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K., Birmingham AL

customer_reviews.title: Love Badescu Products, But Not This One
customer_reviews.text: Smells beautiful, applies wonderfully, feels great - but made me and my S.O. both break out badly. Badescu has some great products - I love their hand cream, elbow cream and rose spray but this one, if you're prone to breakout and/or don't tolerate oils in your facial products, you might want to avoid. If you use the oil cleansing method maybe it'll be great, who knows?
customer_reviews.author: OrganizeZweet

customer_reviews.title: MARIO!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Mario Products since I was 16, great stuff. Fabulous extremely reasonable priced services at his actual NYC location. As I get older I try different products, never disappointed, so happy Amazon has them.
customer_reviews.author: TrixR4Kix

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This face cleanser is wonderful. It makes your skin feel so soft and fresh. I felt like my skin was tighter. I am hoping to see a difference in my skin soon.
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: this is good for cleaning your skin and nurturing it
customer_reviews.text: this is good for cleaning your skin and nurturing it, it depends what youre looking for but its nice for cleaning the face at the end of the day
customer_reviews.author: Ana Mena

customer_reviews.title: I have very dry skin and this has been the only cleanser that makes my skin feel good. I would highly recommend for anyone with dry
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. I have very dry skin and this has been the only cleanser that makes my skin feel good. I would highly recommend for anyone with dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: the most incredible cleanser
customer_reviews.text: The mario badescu cleansing milk is the most gentle and effective cleanser I've ever used on my face, it takes off makeup as easily as it lifts off dirt and grime. I've gotten more compliments on my face since using this product than I've ever received. It's really good, and i love the container, it's simple and classy. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: lovetobicycle

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you have to use a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very milky. Feels like you have to use a lot. Didn't feel cleansing enough for me
customer_reviews.author: jd9085

customer_reviews.title: it's more like a cream
customer_reviews.text: It's not foamy as I expected, it's more like a cream, I used it with my clarisonic and it does take your makeup off but it leaves a creamy layer on your skin, I liked that I don't have to apply moisturizer after washing my face but I'd prefer if it was foamy
customer_reviews.author: carmen parrilla

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: HARMFUL CANCEROUS COLOR DYES ARE IN THE INGREDIENTS ... Do not buy. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: roger331

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle, works well, does not dry my face out!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wasil

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive "rosacea" skin types!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gentle face cleanser. I have rosacea and dry skin. This product doesn't irritate my skin at all
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow where do I start....
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I was a little hesitant to purchase another Mario Badescu product online since I hated the scent of the last one so much that I cannot use it. This product, however, is amazing. It has a pleasant scent. The formula is lightweight and extremely hydrating. You apply the milk cleanser on a wet face and leave it on for a few minutes. Then you take a cotton pad and wipe it off. I would recommend this product to anyone who is like me and loathes washing their face at night. I have oily and have not had any problems with this cleanser. I use it at night time.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love it makes my skin soft and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: alejandra cogoni

customer_reviews.title: Parabens? No Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I did not realize that this had parabens in it until after I received and used. It did work pretty well on my dry skin. But unfortunately for me the results are not worth the chemicals that I was putting on to my skin. I would definitely resume using Mario Badescu if they ever stopped using artificial dyes and parabens in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: MINERAL OIL CLOGS PORES
customer_reviews.text: I wish I paid attention to the reviews this time - I like other MB products so I didn.t Carnatation Oil = Mineral Oil and Mineral Oil clogs pores! "It's derived from petroleum and does not absorb into the skin—its molecular size is simply too big. As a result, mineral oil remains on the surface of skin, making it a reflector of the sun, which can lead to more sun damage and discoloration."
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

product_meta.title: Mario Badescu Cleansing Milk with Carnation Rice Oil
product_meta.description: Size:6 OunceBest for sensitive and dry skin, this creamy, tissue-off cleanser gently cleanses all face make-up and debris from skin’s surface without leaving it dry. Rice Oil contains natural antioxidants that fight free radicals benefiting the skin by slowing skin degeneration in a natural way.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
